title: Face Outside Your Window

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each day, select a player to watch at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Watching a player will roleblock a player and give them the message “You’re too paranoid to leave your house tonight”, and you learn every player that visits your target
- Watching any good veteran-esque roles will cause them to automatically go on alert that night, giving them the message “You saw somebody outside your window. You are on high alert tonight!”
- You’re not affected by anything that requires you to visit your target (such as a werewolf’s rampage or a veteran’s alert), but you can still be tracked and seen by lookouts
- Good Veteran and Veteran like roles have a higher chance of spawning if this role spawns, as determined by the host

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that all alive good team members have been watched at least once before the game ends

desc:
Post 5280
_”It just stares at me, watching my every move. Creeps me out, dude”_
